channel.title: Haha Gold Selling Company
channel.description:
So i bought 66m from a company, then denied the charges lol, do you think they will do what they say in this email i received. I don't really care because i quit rs a long time ago :p
Dear sir， AT First . Thanks for your buying RS Gold on our website.Glod4rs has been committing its effort to improve the service quality and providing more competitive price all the time which wins good reputation with the support of customers. But we regret to notice you that we have not recieved your payment after we finished the service of I2011111503312974019. This incident occurred to us very unexpectedly. So we hope you can confirm it carefully, and send us your payment as soon as possible. Your payment will have a limitation of 3 working days to be finished.If you can not return the payment in time, we will send our question to the operator of Runescape .Jagex. No doubt, your account will be permanently banned.(the time of sending question will be at 0:00 on fourth days after we send you email). So please check the payment and send us the payment in time if it is not done. The payment of this order is 57.83USD. We promise your account on gold4** will be in normal state once we receive the payment and case above won’t happened again. And we are very glad to continue providing you qualite service .Thanks

item.title: Haha Gold Selling Company

@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Time to go buy 3000m for the fuck of it on paypal.

item.title: Haha Gold Selling Company
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Wet Dreamss:

Explanation: I got banned for botting, I emailed saying i would kill myself if i didnt get unbanned, and i got unbanned

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:26, topic:336757”]Sorry for the bump, but I think this warrants it, I just realized I received an email about this specific thread on May 24th, 2010, I never saw it before…

[quote]
To Whom It May Concern,

Re: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=433169.0

I represent Jagex Limited (“Jagex”), developer and publisher of massively multiplayer online games. Jagex has owned and operated RuneScape, the well-known online multiplayer adventure game, at the website www.runescape.com since 2001. There are currently over 5 million active registered players of the game worldwide.

As part of the RuneScape gaming experience, Jagex operates an appeal system whereby players may submit an appeal if they believe there has been a mistake in applying an offence on their account for a breach of recognised rules.

Several discussion threads on your forum have come to our attention which discuss, erroneously, that providing Jagex with false claims of suicidal tendencies or personal harm will force Jagex into granting appeals.

[b]Jagex will, under certain circumstances, escalate claims of suicide or personal harm to the local authorities in the player’s region. This may lead to local law enforcement visiting the player in question and submitting the player to an in-depth discussion on any claims made.

Jagex does not take such claims into consideration when granting or denying appeals and such discussions only serve to provide the player community with false information about Jagex practices.[/b]

Accordingly, Jagex respectfully requests that you act to remove, or disable access to, discussions listed above.

Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Yours faithfully,

Richard Gemmell
Copyright & Intellectual Property

Jagex Ltd.

copyright@jagex.com
www.jagex.com | www.runescape.com

–

IMPORTANT NOTICE

The sender does not guarantee that this message, including any attachment, is secure or virus free. Also, it is confidential and may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient, do not disclose or copy it or its contents. Please telephone or email the sender and delete the message entirely from your system.

Jagex Limited is a company registered in England & Wales with company number 03982706 and a registered office at St John’s Innovation Centre, Cowley Road, Cambridge, CB4 0WS, UK.
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Haha Gold Selling Company
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Anieli:

Not sure exactly how it works but even when money is transferred from one account to another it doesn’t properly go in for a day or two. It gets deducted from the first account and the payment is verified allowing the transaction to continue.

thats bank account to bank account.

I have my debit card set up on my paypal account, so when i received the gold, i debuted the payment.

Saphire`:

Lucky for some, I’ve tried it a few times but never received the gold.

Pm me if u want a list of trusted websites

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Saphire`:

How did you manage to skip payment? Don’t they verify the payments first before going through with the gold transaction?

Yeah, i payed with paypal via my Debit Card, then called my bank and said they didn’t refund the money without me getting a product, so my bank canceled the payment haha

Read full topic

item.title: Haha Gold Selling Company
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:5, topic:425394”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=528059.msg3850256#msg3850256 date=1323968314]

If you can not return the payment in time, we will send our question to the operator of Runescape .Jagex. No doubt, your account will be permanently banned.

This is the part where I laughed the most. Im sure Jagex are against gold selling companies?
[/quote]
Haha, they probably aren’t because it brings more players in (i think u had sarcasm in ur text hard to tell ;)) and if jagex did ban me, i’d just send them another email.

Explanation: I got banned for botting, I emailed saying i would kill myself if i didnt get unbanned, and i got unbanned :D[/quote]

Idk and I did laugh because saying that is so fucking stupid.

Read full topic
